title: Checkout error 500 on mobile
recommended_action: Escalate to payments team; attach logs and reproduce steps.

title: Password reset email not received
recommended_action: Confirm email deliverability; resend reset link; check email provider delay.

title: High page load times on product listing
recommended_action: Collect perf traces; consider CDN caching and DB query optimization.

title: Incorrect pricing displayed for discount code
recommended_action: Investigate discount rules; reproduce with test account; escalate to promotions team.

title: App crashes on Android 11
recommended_action: Collect crash logs, device info; block release until fix if crash rate high.

title: Two-factor authentication not working
recommended_action: Check SMS gateway; advise user to check carrier blocking.

title: Refund not processed after 7 days
recommended_action: Verify refund workflow and payment provider; open ticket with finance.

title: Image upload fails occasionally
recommended_action: Collect client-side logs and server logs; retry with chunked uploads.

title: How to change account email
recommended_action: Send KB article explaining steps to update account email.

title: Search returns inconsistent results
recommended_action: Investigate indexing pipeline and search ranking logs.

title: Session times out too quickly
recommended_action: Review session timeout configuration and token refresh logic.

title: Checkout shows wrong currency conversion
recommended_action: Check currency conversion microservice and cached rates.
